title: Butcher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Butcher someone at night to collect meat.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Killing someone gives you a piece of meat.
- You can use meat to get bonuses.

fields.name: Bonuses from meat:
fields.value:
- Upgrade attack by 1 stage for a night = 1 Meat
- Upgrade defense by 1 stage for a night = 1 Meat
- Attack one extra time = 2 Meat
- Permanent +1 Meat per kill = 2 Meat
- Permanent attack upgrade = 3 Meat (Max = Unstoppable)
- Permanent defense upgrade = 3 Meat (Max = Invincible)
- Permanent extra vote = 3 Meat
- Permanent +1 attack per night = 3 Meat

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 447
*"Wanna try my burger? It's got a special ingredient I gathered just for you."*
